trans-unit.source: Please enter the title of the website.
E-mail address of the system administrator
Auto-generated messages like subscription confirmation e-mails will be sent to this address.
trans-unit.target: Na ovu će se E-mail adresu slati automatski generirane poruke poput potvrde newslettera.

trans-unit.source: The date format string will be parsed with the PHP date() function.
trans-unit.target: Format datuma analizirat će se s PHP date() funkcijom.

trans-unit.source: The time format string will be parsed with the PHP date() function.
trans-unit.target: Format vremena analizirat će se s PHP date() funkcijom.

trans-unit.source: The date and time format string will be parsed with the PHP date() function.
trans-unit.target: Format datuma i vremena analizirat će se s PHP date() funkcijom.

trans-unit.source: Please select the server time zone.
Relative path to the Contao directory
The relative path to the Contao directory is usually set automatically by the install tool.
trans-unit.target: Relativnu putanju do TYPOlight direktorija obično automatski određuje install tool.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to use UTF-8, so special characters are displayed correctly.
trans-unit.target: Preporučuje se da koristite UTF-8 kako bi se posebni znakovi ispravno prikazivali.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of custom layout sections.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati popis vlastitih sekcija izgleda stranice odvojenih zarezom.

trans-unit.source: Disable the periodic command scheduler and execute the cron.php script by a real cron job (which you have to set up manually).
Minify the HTML markup before it is sent to the browser (requires the PHP tidy extension).
Create a compressed version of the combined CSS and JavaScript files. Requires adjustments of the .htaccess file.
Here you can define the number of items per page in the back end.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete definirati broj objekata po stranici u backendu.

trans-unit.source: This overall limit takes effect if a user chooses the "show all records" option.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete definisati broj objekata po stranici u backendu.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of folders which will be exempt from the files synchronisation (e.g. attachments,music_academy). Note that excluded resources cannot be used in e.g. image or download elements!
Do not collapse elements in the back end preview.
trans-unit.target: Nemojte skupiti (kolapsirati) elemente u pregledu backenda.

trans-unit.source: The URL suffix will be added to the URI string to simulate static documents.
trans-unit.target: URL sufiks koji će se dodati URL nizu kako bi se simulirali statični dokumenti.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the cache mode.
Anonymize any IP address that is stored in the database, except in the tl_session table (the IP address is bound to the session for security reasons).
Anonymize the IP addresses that are sent to Google Analytics.
Make Contao generate static URLs without the index.php fragment. This feature requires "mod_rewrite", renaming the ".htaccess.default" file to ".htaccess" and adjusting the RewriteBase as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Učinite da TYPOlight generira statične URL-ove bez index.php fragmenata (zahtijeva "mod_rewrite").

trans-unit.source: Add the language to the URL
Add the language string as first URL parameter (e.g. http://domain.tld/en/).
For an empty URL display the website instead of redirecting to the language root page (not recommended).
Skip the items/ or events/ fragment in the URL and automatically discover the item based on the auto_item parameter.
Use the numeric ID of a page or article instead of its alias.
trans-unit.target: Koristite numerički ID stranice ili članka umjesto njihovih aliasa.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enable folder-style page aliases like docs/install/download.html instead of docs-install-download.html.
Here you can enter a list of allowed HTML tags that will not be stripped.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati popis dozvoljenih HTML tagova koje se neće očistiti nakon sačuvanja.

trans-unit.source: Print certain runtime information like database queries to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Na ekranu prikazivati runtime informacije poput upita za bazu podataka.

trans-unit.source: Do not use the internal cache files (e.g. useful when developing extensions).
Do not check the request token when a form is submitted. Attention: potential security risk!
trans-unit.target: Prilikom slanja obrasca nemojte provjeravati host adresu pošiljatelja. Odabir ove opcije predstavlja potencijalni sigurnosni rizik.

trans-unit.source: An account will be locked if a wrong password is entered three times in a row.
trans-unit.target: Korisnički račun će se zaključati ako korisnik tri puta za redom upiše pogrešnu lozinku.

trans-unit.source: Print error messages to the screen (not recommended for productional sites).
trans-unit.target: Na ekranu prikazivati poruke o greškama (ne preporuča se za aktivne sajtove).

trans-unit.source: Write error messages to the error log file (system/logs/error.log).
Run Contao in safe mode and load only core modules.
Do not bind sessions to IP addresses. Choosing this option is a potential security risk!
trans-unit.target: Nemojte povezivati sesije s IP adresama. Odabir ove opcije predtsavlja potencijalni sigurnosni rizik.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of downloadable file types.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati popis vrsta fajlova čiji se download može napraviti na sajtu, popis podijelite zarezom.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of file types that can be handled by the image class.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati popis vrsta fajlova koje može obrađivati klasa (class) za sliku, popis podijelite zarezom.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of file types that can be edited in the source editor.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati popis vrsta fajlova koje se mogu preuređivati u editoru, popis podijelite zarezom.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of supported template file types.
If the width of an image or movie exceeds this value, it will be adjusted automatically.
trans-unit.target: Ako širina slike ili medija određena u backendu prelazi ovu vrijednost, ona će se automatski podesiti.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the JPG thumbnail quality in percent.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati kvalitetu JPG tumbnail-a u formatu postotka.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum image width that the GD library shall try to handle.
Here you can enter the maximum image height that the GD library shall try to handle.
Here you can set the relative path to the Contao files directory.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete odrediti relativnu putanju TYPOlight direktorija fajlova.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma separated list of uploadable file types.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati popis vrsta fajlova koje se mogu uploadirati na server, popis podijelite zarezom.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum number of simultaneous file uploads.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati maksimalmo dozvoljen broj istovremenih uploada fajlova.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum upload file size in bytes (1 MB = 1000 kB = 1000000 byte).
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete odrediti maksimalno dozvoljenu veličinu fajla za upload, u bytovima (1 MB = 1024 kB = 1024000 bytova)..

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum width for image uploads in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Upišite maksimalno dozvoljenu širinu slike za upload, u pikselima.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum height for image uploads in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Upišite maksimalno dozvoljenu visinu slike za upload, u pikselima.

trans-unit.source: Index pages so they can be searched.
trans-unit.target: Indeksirajte stranice kako bi se one mogle pretraživati.

trans-unit.source: Use this option carefully and always exclude personalized pages from being indexed!
trans-unit.target: Ovu opciju koristite s oprezom i uvijek usključite indeksiranje stranica s posebnim postavkama.

trans-unit.source: Use an SMTP server instead of the PHP mail() function to send e-mails.
trans-unit.target: Za slanje E-mailova koristite SMTP server umjesto PHP mail() funkcije.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the host name of the SMTP server.
Here you can enter the SMTP username.
Here you can enter the SMTP password.
Here you can choose an encryption method (SSL or TLS).
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete odabrati način šifriranja (SSL ili TLS).

trans-unit.source: Please enter the port number of the SMTP server.
Here you can deactivate unneeded extensions.
Here you can enter the storage time for undo steps in seconds (24 hours = 86400 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati trajanje pohrane izmjena u sekundama, koristi se za korake poništavanja izmjena (24 sata = 86400 sekundi).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the storage time for different versions of a record in seconds (90 days = 7776000 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete odrediti trajanje pohrane raznih verzija podatka u sekundama (90 dana = 7776000 sekundi).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the storage time for log entries in seconds (14 days = 1209600 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete odrediti trajanje pohrane zapisa u računalnom dnevniku u sekundama (14 dana = 1209600 sekundi).

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the maximum lifetime of a session in seconds (60 minutes = 3600 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Ovdje upišite maksimalno trajanje jedne sesije (session timeout) u sekundama (60 minuta = 3600 sekundi).

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the front end auto login period (90 days = 7776000 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete odrediti period za automatskog logovanja u backendu (90 dana = 7776000 sekundi).

trans-unit.source: Here you can select a user as the default owner of a page.
trans-unit.target: Odaberite korisnika koji će biti standardni vlasnik stranice.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select a group as the default owner of a page.
trans-unit.target: Odaberite grupu koja će biti standardni vlasnik stranice.

trans-unit.source: Please assign the default access rights for pages and articles.
trans-unit.target: Dodijelite standardna prava pristupa stranicama i člancima.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the live update URL.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje možete upisati Live Update URL.

trans-unit.source: Use the server and the browser cache
trans-unit.target: Koristi cache (memorisanje) od servera i preglednika (browsera)
